summary: Arabic is a widely spoken language, mainly in the Arab world, and is the fifth most common language globally. It has 32 varieties, with Modern Standard Arabic being the official form. Arabic is one of the UN's official languages and is important in Islam. It has influenced many languages, especially in science and culture, and has borrowed words from languages like Hebrew, Latin, and Greek. With around 380 million speakers, it's also the fourth most used language online. Arabic uses its own alphabet, written right to left.
title: Arabic
